column4: Why do I need to run sudo alsamixer in Ubuntu Server via SSH????
The use is not in audio group probably
does that mean that I can't play audio files?
The use is probably not in audio group
Means you need to add that user to audio group.
And then log out and back in so that the new permissions take effect.
how do I logout in a ssh connection? lol
You can't.  But you could reboot it.
im gonna pulseaudio to see if it keeps playing without it
